texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Definition & scope (what DS is / isn't)
texts.text: Definition & scope (what DS is / isn't)

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Data Science (DS) is the disciplined process of turning raw data into useful knowledge, predictions, and decisions. It blends statistics , computing , and domain expertise to discover patterns, build models, and deliver measurable impact (dashboards, forecasts, automated decisions).
texts.text: Data Science (DS) is the disciplined process of turning raw data into useful knowledge, predictions, and decisions. It blends statistics , computing , and domain expertise to discover patterns, build models, and deliver measurable impact (dashboards, forecasts, automated decisions).

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: · What DS is
texts.text: · What DS is

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o A problem-solving practice grounded in data, experimentation, and evidence.
texts.text: o A problem-solving practice grounded in data, experimentation, and evidence.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o End-to-end: from collecting/cleaning data → analysis → modeling → communicating results → deploying and monitoring solutions.
texts.text: o End-to-end: from collecting/cleaning data → analysis → modeling → communicating results → deploying and monitoring solutions.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Output can be insights (reports, dashboards) or systems (recommendation APIs, fraud detectors).
texts.text: o Output can be insights (reports, dashboards) or systems (recommendation APIs, fraud detectors).

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · What DS isn't
texts.text: What DS isn't

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Not just coding or math in isolation; context and decision impact matter.
texts.text: o Not just coding or math in isolation; context and decision impact matter.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Not 'AI for AI's sake'-the goal is business/user value , not fancy algorithms.
texts.text: o Not 'AI for AI's sake'-the goal is business/user value , not fancy algorithms.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Not a one-off report; good DS plans for maintenance and monitoring .
texts.text: o Not a one-off report; good DS plans for maintenance and monitoring .

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Short history & key milestones (stats → ML → big data → deep learning → GenAI)
texts.text: Short history & key milestones (stats → ML → big data → deep learning → GenAI)

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Data Science evolved by layering new computation and data availability on top of classic statistics.
texts.text: Data Science evolved by layering new computation and data availability on top of classic statistics.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Pre-1990s: Statistical inference (sampling, regression) in academia & industry.
texts.text: Pre-1990s: Statistical inference (sampling, regression) in academia & industry.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · 1990s-2000s: Machine Learning (SVMs, ensembles) + data warehousing; web logs at scale.
texts.text: 1990s-2000s: Machine Learning (SVMs, ensembles) + data warehousing; web logs at scale.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · 2010s: 'Big Data' (Hadoop/Spark), cloud computing; deep learning breakthroughs (CNNs for vision, RNN/LSTMs for sequence).
texts.text: 2010s: 'Big Data' (Hadoop/Spark), cloud computing; deep learning breakthroughs (CNNs for vision, RNN/LSTMs for sequence).

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Late 2010s-early 2020s: MLOps maturation; model monitoring, data versioning, model registries.
texts.text: Late 2010s-early 2020s: MLOps maturation; model monitoring, data versioning, model registries.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · 2023+ (GenAI era): Foundation models/transformers (LLMs, multimodal) enable powerful generation and reasoning ; retrieval-augmented systems; governance/regulation ramp up.
texts.text: 2023+ (GenAI era): Foundation models/transformers (LLMs, multimodal) enable powerful generation and reasoning ; retrieval-augmented systems; governance/regulation ramp up.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Why it matters: each wave lowered friction-cheaper storage/compute, better algorithms-expanding what's feasible for organizations.
texts.text: Why it matters: each wave lowered friction-cheaper storage/compute, better algorithms-expanding what's feasible for organizations.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Core pillars (data, math/stats, computing, domain)
texts.text: Core pillars (data, math/stats, computing, domain)

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Great DS sits on four mutually reinforcing pillars.
texts.text: Great DS sits on four mutually reinforcing pillars.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Data
texts.text: Data

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Understanding schemas, quality issues, sampling, bias.
texts.text: o Understanding schemas, quality issues, sampling, bias.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Judging if data can actually answer the question.
texts.text: o Judging if data can actually answer the question.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Math/Statistics
texts.text: Math/Statistics

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Probability, estimation, hypothesis testing, causal thinking.
texts.text: o Probability, estimation, hypothesis testing, causal thinking.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Bias-variance trade-offs; uncertainty quantification.
texts.text: o Bias-variance trade-offs; uncertainty quantification.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Computing
texts.text: Computing

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Programming (Python/SQL), data pipelines, version control, cloud.
texts.text: o Programming (Python/SQL), data pipelines, version control, cloud.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Performance and reliability (batch vs real-time, memory/latency).
texts.text: o Performance and reliability (batch vs real-time, memory/latency).

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Domain Expertise
texts.text: Domain Expertise

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Vocabulary, constraints, and success metrics of the field (finance, health, ops).
texts.text: o Vocabulary, constraints, and success metrics of the field (finance, health, ops).

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Knowing which mistakes are costly and which signals matter.
texts.text: o Knowing which mistakes are costly and which signals matter.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Rule of thumb: weak in any pillar → brittle outcomes (e.g., great model, wrong problem).
texts.text: Rule of thumb: weak in any pillar → brittle outcomes (e.g., great model, wrong problem).

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Data types & sources (structured, semi-structured, unstructured; internal vs external)
texts.text: Data types & sources (structured, semi-structured, unstructured; internal vs external)

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Data comes in different shapes and from many places; that shape influences tools and methods.
texts.text: Data comes in different shapes and from many places; that shape influences tools and methods.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Structured: tables with fixed columns (transactions, customers).
texts.text: Structured: tables with fixed columns (transactions, customers).

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Fits SQL well; easy for classical ML.
texts.text: Fits SQL well; easy for classical ML.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Semi-structured: JSON, logs, event streams.
texts.text: Semi-structured: JSON, logs, event streams.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Needs parsing/flattening; great for behavioral analytics.
texts.text: Needs parsing/flattening; great for behavioral analytics.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Unstructured: text, images, audio, video. Often needs embeddings, deep learning, vector search.
texts.text: Unstructured: text, images, audio, video. Often needs embeddings, deep learning, vector search.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Sources
texts.text: Sources

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Internal: product databases, CRM/ERP, sensors/IoT, support tickets, app telemetry.
texts.text: Internal: product databases, CRM/ERP, sensors/IoT, support tickets, app telemetry.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · External: public datasets, vendors, web/APIs, social media, satellite feeds.
texts.text: External: public datasets, vendors, web/APIs, social media, satellite feeds.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Acquisition modes: batch exports, CDC/streams, webhooks, surveys, scraping (with ethics/legal checks).
texts.text: Acquisition modes: batch exports, CDC/streams, webhooks, surveys, scraping (with ethics/legal checks).

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Quality dimensions to note: completeness, accuracy, timeliness/freshness, consistency, and lineage (where it came from).
texts.text: Quality dimensions to note: completeness, accuracy, timeliness/freshness, consistency, and lineage (where it came from).

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Typical lifecycle (problem → data → EDA → modeling → evaluation → deployment → monitoring)
texts.text: Typical lifecycle (problem → data → EDA → modeling → evaluation → deployment → monitoring)

texts.label: text
texts.orig: A standard lifecycle reduces risk and creates repeatability.
texts.text: A standard lifecycle reduces risk and creates repeatability.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 1. Problem framing
texts.text: Problem framing

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Define users, decisions, and success metrics (business + technical).
texts.text: o Define users, decisions, and success metrics (business + technical).

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Clarify constraints (latency, privacy, budget).
texts.text: o Clarify constraints (latency, privacy, budget).

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 2. Data access & preparation
texts.text: Data access & preparation

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Collect, join, and clean data; document assumptions.
texts.text: o Collect, join, and clean data; document assumptions.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Handle missing values/outliers; guard against leakage.
texts.text: o Handle missing values/outliers; guard against leakage.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 3. EDA (Exploratory Data Analysis)
texts.text: EDA (Exploratory Data Analysis)

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Summaries, distributions, correlations; spot drift or bias.
texts.text: o Summaries, distributions, correlations; spot drift or bias.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Form hypotheses; refine features and targets.
texts.text: o Form hypotheses; refine features and targets.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 4. Modeling
texts.text: Modeling

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Baselines first; iterate with suitable algorithms.
texts.text: o Baselines first; iterate with suitable algorithms.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Cross-validation; hyperparameter tuning; calibration if probabilities matter.
texts.text: o Cross-validation; hyperparameter tuning; calibration if probabilities matter.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 5. Evaluation
texts.text: Evaluation

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Use task-appropriate metrics (e.g., F1 vs RMSE) and subgroup checks.
texts.text: o Use task-appropriate metrics (e.g., F1 vs RMSE) and subgroup checks.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Stress tests (temporal splits, robustness).
texts.text: o Stress tests (temporal splits, robustness).

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 6. Deployment
texts.text: Deployment

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Package as batch job, API, or stream processor; document interfaces.
texts.text: o Package as batch job, API, or stream processor; document interfaces.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Add observability (logging, tracing) and fallback behavior.
texts.text: o Add observability (logging, tracing) and fallback behavior.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 7. Monitoring & improvement
texts.text: Monitoring & improvement

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Track data quality, drift, performance, cost, and usage.
texts.text: o Track data quality, drift, performance, cost, and usage.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Retraining/rollback playbooks; periodic reviews with stakeholders.
texts.text: o Retraining/rollback playbooks; periodic reviews with stakeholders.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Deliverables to expect: data spec → EDA brief → experiment log → model card → runbook.
texts.text: Deliverables to expect: data spec → EDA brief → experiment log → model card → runbook.

texts.orig: Where it's used (everyday examples across industries)
texts.text: Where it's used (everyday examples across industries)

texts.label: text
texts.orig: DS shows up anywhere decisions repeat and data exists.
texts.text: DS shows up anywhere decisions repeat and data exists.

texts.text: Finance: credit scoring, fraud detection, customer churn, ATM cash forecasting.

texts.text: Retail/e-commerce: recommendations, dynamic pricing, demand forecasting, A/B testing.

texts.text: Healthcare: readmission risk, triage prioritization, medical imaging support, capacity planning.

texts.label: list_item

texts.text: Manufacturing/IoT: predictive maintenance, quality inspection, supply-chain optimization.

texts.text: Logistics: route optimization, ETA prediction, inventory positioning.

texts.label: list_item

texts.text: Public sector: tax anomaly detection, traffic management, disaster response analytics.

texts.text: HR/People analytics: attrition risk, hiring funnel diagnostics, workforce planning.

texts.text: Customer support: intent classification, auto-reply, ticket routing, satisfaction prediction.

texts.text: Marketing: segmentation, uplift modeling, campaign optimization, LTV prediction.

texts.text: Pattern: predict + prescribe → make the next action cheaper, faster, or more accurate.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Limits & challenges (data quality, bias, drift, privacy, governance)
texts.text: Limits & challenges (data quality, bias, drift, privacy, governance)

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Real-world DS must navigate technical, ethical, and operational hurdles.
texts.text: Real-world DS must navigate technical, ethical, and operational hurdles.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: · Data/technical
texts.text: · Data/technical

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Missing, noisy, or biased data; label quality issues.
texts.text: o Missing, noisy, or biased data; label quality issues.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Non-stationarity & drift (data or concept changes over time).
texts.text: o Non-stationarity & drift (data or concept changes over time).

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Leakage (using future info), small samples, class imbalance.
texts.text: o Leakage (using future info), small samples, class imbalance.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Model/metrics
texts.text: Model/metrics

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Overfitting; poorly calibrated probabilities.
texts.text: o Overfitting; poorly calibrated probabilities.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Metric mismatch (optimizing AUC when cost is asymmetric).
texts.text: o Metric mismatch (optimizing AUC when cost is asymmetric).

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Ethics/privacy
texts.text: Ethics/privacy

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o PII/PHI handling, consent, retention limits.
texts.text: o PII/PHI handling, consent, retention limits.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Fairness: subgroup performance gaps; disparate impact.
texts.text: o Fairness: subgroup performance gaps; disparate impact.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Transparency & contestability (explainability, human-in-the-loop).
texts.text: o Transparency & contestability (explainability, human-in-the-loop).

texts.text: Operations/governance

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Reproducibility, versioning, and approvals (model risk management).
texts.text: o Reproducibility, versioning, and approvals (model risk management).

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Monitoring blind spots; ownership after go-live.
texts.text: o Monitoring blind spots; ownership after go-live.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Cost control (compute/storage/egress) and vendor lock-in.
texts.text: o Cost control (compute/storage/egress) and vendor lock-in.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Mitigations
texts.text: Mitigations

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Data contracts/SLAs, quality checks, and lineage.
texts.text: Data contracts/SLAs, quality checks, and lineage.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Robust validation schemes, model cards, and review boards.
texts.text: Robust validation schemes, model cards, and review boards.

texts.label: list_item

texts.text: Privacy-by-design (minimize data, access controls, audits).

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Clear runbooks for retraining, rollback, and incident response.
texts.text: Clear runbooks for retraining, rollback, and incident response.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Common project archetypes
texts.text: Common project archetypes

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Most real projects fit one (or a blend) of these patterns. Knowing the archetype clarifies data needs, metrics, and delivery shape.
texts.text: Most real projects fit one (or a blend) of these patterns. Knowing the archetype clarifies data needs, metrics, and delivery shape.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Prediction (regression): predict a continuous value (price, demand, time-to-fail).
texts.text: Prediction (regression): predict a continuous value (price, demand, time-to-fail).

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Data: tabular, time series. Metrics: MAE/RMSE/MAPE. Actions: price updates, inventory levels.
texts.text: Data: tabular, time series. Metrics: MAE/RMSE/MAPE. Actions: price updates, inventory levels.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Classification: assign labels (fraud/not, churn/not). Data: tabular, logs, events. Metrics: Precision/Recall/F1/AUC; cost-sensitive metrics.
texts.text: Classification: assign labels (fraud/not, churn/not). Data: tabular, logs, events. Metrics: Precision/Recall/F1/AUC; cost-sensitive metrics.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Recommendation/Ranking: order items/users/ads.
texts.text: Recommendation/Ranking: order items/users/ads.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Data: interactions, catalogs, embeddings. Metrics: CTR, MAP/NDCG, coverage/diversity, revenue per session.
texts.text: Data: interactions, catalogs, embeddings. Metrics: CTR, MAP/NDCG, coverage/diversity, revenue per session.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · NLP: classify/extract/summarize/search text.
texts.text: NLP: classify/extract/summarize/search text.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Data: tickets, emails, chats, docs. Metrics: F1 (NER/cls), ROUGE/BERTScore (gen), MRR/NDCG (search).
texts.text: Data: tickets, emails, chats, docs. Metrics: F1 (NER/cls), ROUGE/BERTScore (gen), MRR/NDCG (search).

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Vision: detect/classify/segment images or video.
texts.text: Vision: detect/classify/segment images or video.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Data: images, frames, annotations. Metrics: mAP, IoU, recall at fixed FP rate.
texts.text: Data: images, frames, annotations. Metrics: mAP, IoU, recall at fixed FP rate.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Anomaly/Quality: find rare/novel events (fraud, defects). Data: sensor logs, transactions. Metrics: precision at k, alert yield, time-to-detect.
texts.text: Anomaly/Quality: find rare/novel events (fraud, defects). Data: sensor logs, transactions. Metrics: precision at k, alert yield, time-to-detect.

texts.orig: o Task ↔ method: linear/logistic for simple & interpretable; trees/GBM for nonlinear tabular; kmeans/PCA for structure.
texts.text: o Task ↔ method: linear/logistic for simple & interpretable; trees/GBM for nonlinear tabular; kmeans/PCA for structure.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Workflow: split → baseline → features → model → tune → evaluate → calibrate (if probabilities matter).
texts.text: o Workflow: split → baseline → features → model → tune → evaluate → calibrate (if probabilities matter).

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Key knobs: regularization, class weights, early stopping; calibration curves.
texts.text: o Key knobs: regularization, class weights, early stopping; calibration curves.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Practice
texts.text: Practice

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Build a naive baseline then beat it with 2 models; log metrics and rationale.
texts.text: o Build a naive baseline then beat it with 2 models; log metrics and rationale.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Tune GBM (learning_rate, max_depth, n_estimators) and plot validation curves.
texts.text: o Tune GBM (learning_rate, max_depth, n_estimators) and plot validation curves.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Pitfalls
texts.text: Pitfalls

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Leakage, time-series evaluated with random splits, using accuracy on imbalanced data, overfitting for tiny gains.
texts.text: o Leakage, time-series evaluated with random splits, using accuracy on imbalanced data, overfitting for tiny gains.

texts.text: Artifacts

texts.orig: Communication (clear narratives, simple visuals, stakeholder updates)
texts.text: Communication (clear narratives, simple visuals, stakeholder updates)

texts.label: text
texts.orig: If others can't understand or act on your work, it doesn't matter. Communicate decisions, not just numbers.
texts.text: If others can't understand or act on your work, it doesn't matter. Communicate decisions, not just numbers.

texts.text: o Story shape: context → insight → action → impact , with an executive summary up top.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Updates: regular cadence, risks/assumptions, asks/decisions needed.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Reproducibility (Git, environments, notebooks vs scripts discipline)
texts.text: Reproducibility (Git, environments, notebooks vs scripts discipline)

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Reproducibility is the 'science' in data science. Anyone should be able to rerun your work and get the same result.
texts.text: Reproducibility is the 'science' in data science. Anyone should be able to rerun your work and get the same result.

texts.orig: · Learn
texts.text: · Learn

texts.text: o Git flow (branches, PRs, reviews), semantic commits, tagging releases.

texts.text: o Environments: pinned deps, lockfiles, seeds; data & model versioning (DVC/MLflow).

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Structure: src/ packages, notebooks/ for exploration, config/logging/testing basics.

texts.text: o Convert a notebook into a Python package + CLI entrypoint; reproduce a run from scratch.

texts.text: o Track experiments (params/metrics/artifacts) with MLflow or W&B.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Generative AI & foundation models (text, image, multimodal assistants)
texts.text: Generative AI & foundation models (text, image, multimodal assistants)

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Foundation models shift DS from 'predict' to 'generate & reason,' enabling assistants that read, write, summarize, plan, and create images/audio/video. Multimodal models combine text, images, tables, and sensor data so one system can parse documents, inspect photos, and chat about dashboards.
texts.text: Foundation models shift DS from 'predict' to 'generate & reason,' enabling assistants that read, write, summarize, plan, and create images/audio/video. Multimodal models combine text, images, tables, and sensor data so one system can parse documents, inspect photos, and chat about dashboards.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Where it helps: document processing (RAG), code/data copilots, customer support, creative assets, analytics Q&A.
texts.text: Where it helps: document processing (RAG), code/data copilots, customer support, creative assets, analytics Q&A.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Key enablers: prompt engineering, retrieval-augmented generation, fine-tuning/LoRA, vector databases, guardrails.
texts.text: Key enablers: prompt engineering, retrieval-augmented generation, fine-tuning/LoRA, vector databases, guardrails.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · KPIs to track: task success rate, time-to-answer, hallucination rate, top-k retrieval precision/recall, cost per request.
texts.text: KPIs to track: task success rate, time-to-answer, hallucination rate, top-k retrieval precision/recall, cost per request.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Risks: hallucinations, data leakage via prompts, IP/privacy exposure, unpredictable latency/cost spikes.
texts.text: Risks: hallucinations, data leakage via prompts, IP/privacy exposure, unpredictable latency/cost spikes.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Practical actions: start with RAG (not full fine-tune), add deterministic fallbacks, log prompts/answers, redteam prompts, maintain a prompt/model registry.
texts.text: Practical actions: start with RAG (not full fine-tune), add deterministic fallbacks, log prompts/answers, redteam prompts, maintain a prompt/model registry.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Real-time & edge inference (low-latency decisions, streaming features)
texts.text: Real-time & edge inference (low-latency decisions, streaming features)

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Businesses want decisions 'in the moment'-fraud checks during checkout, recommendations as a user scrolls, safety checks on a factory line. Edge deployment keeps inference close to the event for reliability and privacy.
texts.text: Businesses want decisions 'in the moment'-fraud checks during checkout, recommendations as a user scrolls, safety checks on a factory line. Edge deployment keeps inference close to the event for reliability and privacy.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Use cases: fraud/abuse detection, dynamic pricing, on-device quality inspection, driver/robot assistance, IoT anomaly alerts.
texts.text: Use cases: fraud/abuse detection, dynamic pricing, on-device quality inspection, driver/robot assistance, IoT anomaly alerts.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Tech patterns: streaming features (Kafka/PubSub), low-latency feature stores, on-device/edge runtimes (ONNX, TensorRT), async queues, canary rollouts.
texts.text: Tech patterns: streaming features (Kafka/PubSub), low-latency feature stores, on-device/edge runtimes (ONNX, TensorRT), async queues, canary rollouts.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · SLOs/KPIs: p95/p99 latency, throughput (req/s), freshness (feature age), offline → online feature parity, alert precision@K.
texts.text: SLOs/KPIs: p95/p99 latency, throughput (req/s), freshness (feature age), offline → online feature parity, alert precision@K.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Risks: feature skew vs training data, cold-start, backpressure under spikes, on-device model drift.
texts.text: Risks: feature skew vs training data, cold-start, backpressure under spikes, on-device model drift.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Practical actions: define online/offline contract for features, add shadow mode before going live, measure end-to-end latency (network+model), budget for circuit breakers & fallbacks.
texts.text: Practical actions: define online/offline contract for features, add shadow mode before going live, measure end-to-end latency (network+model), budget for circuit breakers & fallbacks.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Privacy-enhancing tech (federated learning, differential privacy)
texts.text: Privacy-enhancing tech (federated learning, differential privacy)

texts.label: text
texts.orig: PETs let you learn from sensitive data without centralizing raw records or exposing individuals. They're becoming table stakes where regulation or trust is critical.
texts.text: PETs let you learn from sensitive data without centralizing raw records or exposing individuals. They're becoming table stakes where regulation or trust is critical.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Approaches: federated learning (train where data lives), differential privacy (noise to protect individuals), secure enclaves/TEEs, secure aggregation, synthetic data.
texts.text: Approaches: federated learning (train where data lives), differential privacy (noise to protect individuals), secure enclaves/TEEs, secure aggregation, synthetic data.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · When to use: healthcare/finance/education, cross-org collaborations, mobile/edge training, jurisdictions with strict residency.
texts.text: When to use: healthcare/finance/education, cross-org collaborations, mobile/edge training, jurisdictions with strict residency.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · KPIs: privacy budget ( ε ), utility loss vs baseline, participation rate of clients, secure aggregation coverage, audit findings.
texts.text: KPIs: privacy budget ( ε ), utility loss vs baseline, participation rate of clients, secure aggregation coverage, audit findings.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Risks: degraded accuracy if privacy budget is too tight, complex ops, false sense of security if governance is weak.
texts.text: Risks: degraded accuracy if privacy budget is too tight, complex ops, false sense of security if governance is weak.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Practical actions: classify data/PII, select PET per risk, start with DP on analytics queries, pilot FL with a narrow model, document ε and trade-offs in model cards.
texts.text: Practical actions: classify data/PII, select PET per risk, start with DP on analytics queries, pilot FL with a narrow model, document ε and trade-offs in model cards.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Automation & copilots (AutoML, code/data assistants)
texts.text: Automation & copilots (AutoML, code/data assistants)

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Copilots lift productivity: they scaffold pipelines, generate SQL, write tests, and review notebooks. AutoML covers baseline modeling/tuning so scientists focus on framing, evaluation, and deployment.
texts.text: Copilots lift productivity: they scaffold pipelines, generate SQL, write tests, and review notebooks. AutoML covers baseline modeling/tuning so scientists focus on framing, evaluation, and deployment.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Targets: SQL generation/validation, data quality rule suggestions, feature discovery, pipeline boilerplate, docstrings/tests, unit data checks.
texts.text: Targets: SQL generation/validation, data quality rule suggestions, feature discovery, pipeline boilerplate, docstrings/tests, unit data checks.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Benefits: faster iteration, fewer trivial bugs, better onboarding, standardized scaffolds.
texts.text: Benefits: faster iteration, fewer trivial bugs, better onboarding, standardized scaffolds.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · KPIs: cycle time (idea → first result), review defects caught, % code/tests suggested by copilot adopted, analyst hours saved.
texts.text: KPIs: cycle time (idea → first result), review defects caught, % code/tests suggested by copilot adopted, analyst hours saved.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Risks: cargo-culted code, hidden data assumptions, dependency on vendor models.
texts.text: Risks: cargo-culted code, hidden data assumptions, dependency on vendor models.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Practical actions: define 'copilot-ready' repos with templates, require human review, keep a pattern library of approved prompts, restrict copilot access to non-sensitive code/data.
texts.text: Practical actions: define 'copilot-ready' repos with templates, require human review, keep a pattern library of approved prompts, restrict copilot access to non-sensitive code/data.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Regulation & model governance (AI acts, audit trails, documentation)
texts.text: Regulation & model governance (AI acts, audit trails, documentation)

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Scrutiny is rising: organizations must prove models are safe, fair, documented, and controllable. Governance turns ad-hoc ML into audited, repeatable practice.
texts.text: Scrutiny is rising: organizations must prove models are safe, fair, documented, and controllable. Governance turns ad-hoc ML into audited, repeatable practice.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Core components: risk tiering (use-case risk levels), approvals, model cards & data sheets, change management, incident playbooks, independent validation, lineage & access logs.
texts.text: Core components: risk tiering (use-case risk levels), approvals, model cards & data sheets, change management, incident playbooks, independent validation, lineage & access logs.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · What to document: purpose, data sources, consent, metrics (overall + subgroups), limitations, human oversight, rollback criteria, retraining cadence.
texts.text: What to document: purpose, data sources, consent, metrics (overall + subgroups), limitations, human oversight, rollback criteria, retraining cadence.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · KPIs: audit pass rate, time to approve changes, % models with complete documentation, incidents MTTR, subgroup gap thresholds.
texts.text: KPIs: audit pass rate, time to approve changes, % models with complete documentation, incidents MTTR, subgroup gap thresholds.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Risks: 'paper compliance' without monitoring, untracked prompt/model drift, unclear ownership.
texts.text: Risks: 'paper compliance' without monitoring, untracked prompt/model drift, unclear ownership.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Practical actions: set model inventory & registry, standardize review checklists, automate lineage/metrics capture, schedule periodic fairness & drift reviews.
texts.text: Practical actions: set model inventory & registry, standardize review checklists, automate lineage/metrics capture, schedule periodic fairness & drift reviews.

texts.text: Demand drivers (digital transformation, data abundance, automation ROI)

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Organizations fund DS because digital processes throw off data, AI can turn that data into decisions, and automation improves margins at scale. Boards see DS as a lever for growth, risk control, and cost reduction.
texts.text: Organizations fund DS because digital processes throw off data, AI can turn that data into decisions, and automation improves margins at scale. Boards see DS as a lever for growth, risk control, and cost reduction.

texts.text: o Moat: embeddings quality + chunking + metadata pipeline. Metrics: recall@K, MRR/NDCG, cost/query.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Build vs buy economics (TCO, lock-in, talent availability)
texts.text: Build vs buy economics (TCO, lock-in, talent availability)

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Choosing to build or buy hinges on total cost, speed, and how 'differentiating' the problem is for your org.
texts.text: Choosing to build or buy hinges on total cost, speed, and how 'differentiating' the problem is for your org.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Cost components (TCO)
texts.text: Cost components (TCO)

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Data work (ingestion/cleaning/labels), infra (compute/storage/egress), platform tooling, talent, security/compliance, ongoing monitoring.
texts.text: o Data work (ingestion/cleaning/labels), infra (compute/storage/egress), platform tooling, talent, security/compliance, ongoing monitoring.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · When to buy
texts.text: When to buy

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Commodity capability (OCR, transcription, generic chat), need speed to market, limited DS/MLE bandwidth, strong vendor benchmarks & SLAs.
texts.text: o Commodity capability (OCR, transcription, generic chat), need speed to market, limited DS/MLE bandwidth, strong vendor benchmarks & SLAs.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · When to build
texts.text: When to build

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Proprietary data is your moat, tight integration/latency constraints, scale makes vendor usage expensive, IP/regulatory needs.
texts.text: o Proprietary data is your moat, tight integration/latency constraints, scale makes vendor usage expensive, IP/regulatory needs.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Lock-in checks
texts.text: Lock-in checks

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Export paths for data/models, BYO-key encryption, transparent pricing, offline/batch fallbacks.
texts.text: o Export paths for data/models, BYO-key encryption, transparent pricing, offline/batch fallbacks.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Simple rule
texts.text: Simple rule

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Pilot with buy; if usage > threshold and data advantage emerges, re-platform to build.
texts.text: o Pilot with buy; if usage > threshold and data advantage emerges, re-platform to build.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Geographic considerations (remote work, regional hubs, compliance regimes)
texts.text: Geographic considerations (remote work, regional hubs, compliance regimes)

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Talent and compliance shape where and how you execute. Remote expands the pool; regulations constrain data flow.
texts.text: Talent and compliance shape where and how you execute. Remote expands the pool; regulations constrain data flow.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Talent hubs
texts.text: Talent hubs

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Mature DS/MLE communities (US, EU, India, SEA) + emerging hubs near universities.
texts.text: o Mature DS/MLE communities (US, EU, India, SEA) + emerging hubs near universities.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Nearshore/offshore models for 24/7 ops and cost leverage.
texts.text: o Nearshore/offshore models for 24/7 ops and cost leverage.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Compliance & data residency
texts.text: Compliance & data residency

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Sector rules (banking/health), cross-border transfer limits, localization laws.
texts.text: o Sector rules (banking/health), cross-border transfer limits, localization laws.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Operating model
texts.text: Operating model

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Hybrid teams: product & data owners near users; platform & model ops distributed.
texts.text: o Hybrid teams: product & data owners near users; platform & model ops distributed.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Practical tips
texts.text: Practical tips

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Keep sensitive training data region-local; move models not data; document data contracts.
texts.text: o Keep sensitive training data region-local; move models not data; document data contracts.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Barriers & risks (talent gap, data access, change management)
texts.text: Barriers & risks (talent gap, data access, change management)

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Most failed DS programs fall on organizational-not algorithmic-issues. Plan for them early.
texts.text: Most failed DS programs fall on organizational-not algorithmic-issues. Plan for them early.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Common blockers
texts.text: Common blockers

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Unclear problem owners; missing labels or data contracts; privacy/security reviews slow access.
texts.text: o Unclear problem owners; missing labels or data contracts; privacy/security reviews slow access.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Shadow metrics (different teams compute KPIs differently); low adoption of outputs.
texts.text: o Shadow metrics (different teams compute KPIs differently); low adoption of outputs.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Risk patterns
texts.text: Risk patterns

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Model built without deployment path; drift/monitoring missing; ROI not measured.
texts.text: o Model built without deployment path; drift/monitoring missing; ROI not measured.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Mitigations
texts.text: Mitigations

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: o Problem charters with owners/KPIs, metric definitions in a semantic layer, data access playbooks, model registry + monitoring SLOs, change-management plan (training, incentives).
texts.text: o Problem charters with owners/KPIs, metric definitions in a semantic layer, data access playbooks, model registry + monitoring SLOs, change-management plan (training, incentives).
